StringTable.Label: NeedyAbility_Desc
StringTable.String: +2 Approval for every player that loves you. Up to a maximum of +10.

StringTable.Label: DivineGuardianAbility_Desc
StringTable.String: Start with the Jeff Warship and unlocks the Temple of Jeff planetary improvement.

StringTable.Label: FederationAbility_Desc
StringTable.String: Start with the Universal Translator and Interstellar Alliances technologies unlocked.

StringTable.Label: UnshackledAbility_Desc
StringTable.String: Provides +30% to your ships damage, agility and accuracy when fighting Synthetic fleets.
